column4: anyone know if its possible for ubuntu to automatically put the icons on the right?
I don't think so - there might be a way - you can ask over at #gnome
Of course if you're feeling "Gutsy" you can upgrade now :)
Just upgrade, but if you're fairly new , I would recommend it...
Yeah it won't nuke anything but Gutsy is not ready for general consumption... so unless you know what you're doing...
You can use gaprted for that - just have to boot from live cd and unmount drives :)
gparted not working to resize those partitions? That's surprising...
If you can mount the drive you should be able to back up :)
Though yeah maybe some corruption there...
Quicktime works - I think it's one of the gstreamer packages ...
